description: Try our easy to follow Macro Christmas Mince Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Macro Christmas Mince Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp Queen Natural Vanilla Concentrated Extract

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 140°C. Lightly grease and line a baking tray with baking paper.
In large bowl, combine diced apples, suet, raisins, sultanas, candied peel, brown sugar, orange zest and juice, lemon zest, almonds, brandy, mixed spice and cinnamon.
Spread on lined baking tray and bake for 30 mins.
Place cooked mixture back into bowl, add more brandy or sherry to taste. Fold through with a wooden spoon. Cover with cling wrap. Refrigerate overnight.
In food processor, add flour and butter. Pulse until mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs.
Add sour cream, lemon zest, vanilla and 90ml ice-cold water and pulse until the dough starts to combine.
On lightly floured surface gently form pastry into a ball. Wrap in cling wrap. Refrigerate for 20 mins.
Preheat oven to 180°C. Heavily grease a 12-hole muffin tray.
On lightly floured surface, roll pastry to 2cm thick. Cut into rounds and carefully press into muffin tray.
Spoon in the filling, pressing down to fill. Top with a small piece of rolled pastry in the shape of your choice.
Bake for 20-25 mins or until golden brown and pastry is cooked.
